title: Ashampoo WinOptimizer 11.00.40 Multilingual + Reg-TE
description:
================
[INFO:]
================

Ashampoo WinOptimizer 11.00.40 Multilingual + Reg-TE | 32.7 MB

Ashampoo WinOptimizer 11 is the ultimate virtual service technician to clean, optimize and protect your PC. Use Ashampoo WinOptimizer 10 to make your PC faster and more responsive, clean and declutter your system, fix and repair common Windows errors and improve system stability, achieve and maintain peak performance. Also you can protect your privacy and safeguard or remove sensitive data. Computer maintenance is essential but time-consuming. Like any other machine, computers require maintenance at regular intervals to ensure smooth operation. Relying on built-in facilities alone, though possible, is a daunting task that requires intricate knowledge as well as constant efforts to keep up to speed with technical developments. DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t let background tasks take time away from you! Let Ashampoo WinOptimizer 10 handle system complexity while you focus on what computers were made for Ã¢â‚¬â€œ to get your work done!

Ashampoo WinOptimizer 11 Modules:

General:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Backup management: Restore individual backups, to reverse recent changes, or delete them.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Restore Point Manager: Windows comes with a built-in feature that backups sensitive system files, e.g. during program installations. Use this module to review, restore or delete these backups.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Task Scheduler: Automatically carry out background tasks at specified intervals.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Settings: Customize general as well as module-specific settings.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Statistics: Review application performance metrics.

Analyze system:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ System information: Get detailed information on your machineÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s hard- and software specifications.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Disk Space Explorer: Scan your hard disks and analyze disk space distribution to identify and combat resource hogs globally or individually by file types.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ System Benchmark: Measure your machineÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s performance and compare it against other computers online.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Disk Doctor: Find and detect defective files on your hard disks and attempt to recover them either globally or by individual file selection.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ HDD Inspector: Analyze your hard diskÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s S.M.A.R.T. data based on the same powerful algorithm used in Ashampoo HDD Control 2 and determine the health status and long-term reliability of your drives.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Font Manager: Preview and remove installed system fonts.

Improve performance:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Service Manager: Review and adjust Windows service startup settings based on recommendations and submit your own ratings.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ StartUp Tuner: Improve the startup time of your PC and disable unnecessary Autostart entries.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Internet Tuner: Auto-tune your network settings for best internet performance.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Process Manager: Manage running processes and kill non-responsive tasks. Apply filters to hide system-critical processes.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Uninstall Manager: Review a list of all installed applications and remove both programs and corrupted entries individually.

Maintain system:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ One-Click Optimizer: Sequentially run Internet Cleaner, Drive Cleaner and Registry Optimizer to remove clutter in one swipe without user interaction.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Drive Cleaner: Delete temporary files and clear your Windows History to reclaim hard disk space.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Registry Optimizer: Optimize, clean and repair your Windows Registry database.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Internet Cleaner: Remove your Internet traces and delete temporary Internet files, clear your browser cache and erase your browsing history.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Defrag 3: Defrag your drives and speed up read/write operations. Supports Pro-Active Defrag to prevent future drive fragmentation.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Registry Defrag: Restructure your Windows registry to improve access times and speed up your Windows.

File tools:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ File Wiper: Protect your privacy and permanently erase files and folders to render them unrecoverable for file restoration tools. It is also possible, to overwrite empty hard disk space to prevent restoration of already deleted files.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ File Encrypter & Decrypter: Encrypt and password-protect sensitive files. To decrypt, use Ashampoo WinOptimizer 10 or create standalone executables.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ File Splitter & Joiner: Split up large files for easy distribution and rejoin them using Ashampoo WinOptimizer 10.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Undeleter: Recover accidentally deleted files and folders with ease.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Link Checker: Detect and remove invalid application shortcuts.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Duplicate Finder: Locate and remove redundant files to reclaim disk space. Use the available settings to specify search locations, define search criteria or add exceptions.

Customize Windows:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tweaking: Access and customize hidden system settings to fine-tune Windows to your needs or rely on pre-defined system profiles.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Anti-Spy: Protect your privacy and restrict in- and outbound network traffic as caused by Windows error reports and application remote access features.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ File Associator: Customize Windows file associations and individually assign applications to file types.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Context Menu Manager: Enable/disable Windows context menu entries for files and folders.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Icon Saver: Save and restore the exact positions of your desktop icons, e.g. in the event of unwanted changes due to graphics driver installations etc.


Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
Language : English


================
[INSTALL NOTES:]
================

1. Install "ashampoo_winoptimizer_11_e11.00.40_sm.exe".  Do not launchAshampoo WinOptimizer 11 yet.  
2. Next import the Registration.reg file into your registry, which can be found in the Reg folder.
3. Make sure you have administator mode if you have problems importing the regfile.  
4. Ashampoo WinOptimizer 11 is now fully registered and activated!

NOTE: Keygens, patches, Activators, Cracks, Loaders etc. are always scanned with Kaspersky Internet Security 2014 Latest Version to Avoid Virus
     issues.
